content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to search for the most promising ideas for interstellar travel and propulsion systems. The search returned several articles, including Project Daedalus, a concept design for an interstellar probe, and a NASA report on a breakthrough propulsion architecture for interstellar precursor missions. Other articles discuss new technologies that could make interstellar travel a reality, such as nuclear thermal propulsion engines and laser-pushed light sails. There are also promising propulsion schemes in development, including ion thrusters and fusion-driven rockets. Interstellar travel and exploration is technically possible, but it is not easy.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Breakthrough Starshot project, Daedalus spacecraft, and using black holes for interstellar travel"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://phys.org/news/2019-03-black-holes-conquer-space-halo.html", "https://www.livescience.com/55981-futuristic-spacecraft-for-interstellar-space-travel.html", "https://interestingengineering.com/science/from-point-a-to-point-b-how-do-we-achieve-interstellar-flight", "https://www.universetoday.com/141724/using-black-holes-to-conquer-space-the-halo-drive/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstellar_travel", "https://academic-accelerator.com/encyclopedia/interstellar-travel", "https://arxiv.org/pdf/1707.01174", "https://www.centauri-dreams.org/category/breakthrough-propulsion/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
